item.title: Report X-2023120863
item.description:
Report X-2023120863

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: WALLINGFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived to station by trailer. Once pulled off it was isolated and QA was notified. The package was inspected, all info was taken for necessary reports, and the product was sealed in a drum for necessary transport once disposition is received. DescribePack: loose seal on lid of inner container DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Package was isolated in hazmat cage and placed in drum once properly inspected

item.title: Report X-2023120649
item.description:
Report X-2023120649

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-08
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found during outbound sort, immediately placed in a red hazmat bin with a liner and brought to QA for evaluation of package. DescribePack: The plastic bottle has a loose lid and contents leaked into package. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Upon discovery, the package was placed in a red hazmat bin to contain leakage; area was looked over to make sure it was cleaned up.

item.title: Report X-2023120894
item.description:
Report X-2023120894

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-02T15:11:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was sent to overhead sort system and was observed to be wet when it arrived at van line. Package was brought to QA cage for inspection and placed in a plastic tote. DescribePack: All twelve inner aerosol cans have cracked and/or missing caps and/or spray nozzles, discharged. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of flammable liquid.

item.title: Report E-2023120458
item.description:
Report E-2023120458

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-02T15:11:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-06
  • City: MERIDEN
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that due to a nail puncture, approximately 1 ounce of Sheetz PreSoak & Wheel Cleaner (Hazardous - UN1814) was released. The caller stated that the released product was contained to the dock floor. The SDS was reviewed with the terminal and they felt comfortable cleaning the release donning the proper PPE per SDS. The released product, damaged jug, and oil-dri were placed into a 5 gallon poly drum and staged in OS&D. There were no drains, soils or waterways reported to have been impacted by the release.
